EMW_メッセージウィンドウ指定 4 終了禁止
チュートリアルめんたい_0000

While you're on the map, you can play mentai with \c[14]anyone\c[0]
by pressing right click on them
You can obtain experience points and memories points by winning
チュートリアルめんたい_0001

There's no penalty for losing, so you can have matches
as many as you want
チュートリアルめんたい_0002

Mentai is played in turns. During your turn, aim to stop 
\c[14]chinchin\c[0] gauge bar on the right at its maximum!
チュートリアルめんたい_0003
If you manage to stop it on C area, the damage will be critical!
Let's aim for big damage by timing your moves!
チュートリアルめんたい_0004

Lastly, you may do one-hit kill if you manage
to stop the bar on its very peak!

However, this may not activate for some cases
Please be careful!
チュートリアルめんたい_0005

Winning the first-time for each opponent will reward you
items and experience

The NPCs on the map may be \c[14]changed\c[0] as the date
progresses, so make sure you challenge
them all!
チュートリアルめんたい_0006

Your mentai will grow based on \n[1]'s \c[14]level\c[0],
so accumulating experience is the key!
Many \c[14]unseen strong opponents\c[0] are waiting for you!
チュートリアルめんたい_0007

By the way, you can perform \c[14]modifications\c[0] of your mentai
at the hideout, you might want to check it later!
